name: Arcane Binding
rules: Attach to target hero.;Ongoing: As this ability enters play, choose ability, ally, or equipment. Attached hero's controller can't play more than one card of the chosen kind per turn.

name: Arcane Essence
rules: Exhaust all resources you control. Draw two cards.

name: Arctic Blast
rules: Your hero deals two frost damage to each opposing ally. Allies dealt damage this way have -2 ATK this turn.

name: Bestial Resurgence
rules: Put up to three Pets with different names from your graveyard into your hand.

name: Blessing of the Templar
rules: Attach to target hero.;Ongoing: Attached hero has Assault 3 and Mend 3.

name: Blood Plague
rules: Attach to target hero.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 shadow damage to attached hero. If an ally in attached hero's party would be dealt damage it is dealt that much +1 instead.

name: Bloody Slaughter
rules: Your hero deals X melee damage to target exhausted hero or ally, where X is the cost of a non-hero Druid or Rogue you control.

name: Boundless Concentration
rules: Ready up to X resources you control, where X is the cost of target non-hero Hunter or Mage you control.

name: Butcher
rules: Finishing Move (To play, remove X Combo cards in your graveyard from the game, where X is 5 or less.) Choose X from among ability, ally, equipment, location, and quest. Target player reveals his hand and discards a card of each of the chosen kinds.

name: Close Quarters Combat
rules: Combat Hero Required; Each player destroys resources he controls until he controls three.

name: Colossal Totem
rules: Ongoing: If a friendly hero or ally would be dealt damage, it's dealt to this ability instead. (Totems can be attacked or targeted like allies.)
flavour: Who would have thought that a huge piece of lumber could take such punishment. - Ivan, Bladewind Brute

name: Command Decision
rules: Ongoing: 1, [Exhaust] -> Target ally you control has Protector this turn.

name: Cone of Cold
rules: Your hero deals 1 frost damage to each of upto three target hero and/or allies. A character dealt damage this way can't attack this turn.

name: Conquering Shout
rules: Ongoing: Allies you control have Assault 2.

name: Death Gate
rules: Destroy a resource you control. If you do, search your deck for a location and put it into play face up and exhausted.

name: Deliberate Heal
rules: Ongoing: At the start of your turn, destroy this ability. If you do, your hero heals 5 damage from target hero or ally, and draw a card.

name: Deliberate Vengeance
rules: Ongoing: At the start of your turn, destroy this ability. If you do, your hero deals 2 unpreventable holy damage to each opposing hero and ally.

name: Demonic Accord
rules: Ongoing: On your turn, 1 [Exhaust] -> Target ally has +1 / -1 this turn.

name: Desperate Condemnation
rules: If your hero has 15 or more damage, it deals 5 unpreventable holy damage to target ally.

name: Desperate Plea
rules: If your hero has 15 or more damage, it heals 10 damage from itself.

name: Divert
rules: Attach to target ability, ally or equipment you control.;Ongoing: Opposing cards and effects must target attached card if able.

name: Elemental Shield
rules: Ongoing: This ability enters play with three water counters. [Exhaust] -> Ready a resource you control for each water counter, then remove a water counter. If none remain, then destroy this ability.

name: Embolism
rules: Target player discards X cards, where X is the cost of a non-hero Priest or Rogue you control.

name: Embrace of the Nether
rules: As an additional cost to play, choose ability, ally or equipment and discard a card of that kind. Remove target card from the game if it shares that kind.

name: Entomb
rules: Put target equipment on the bottom of its owner's deck.
flavour: Would you prefer they bury you instead? - Chloe Mithrilbolt

name: Fan of Knives
rules: Your hero deals 2 ranged damage to each opposing hero and ally. On your turn: Discard a weapon -> Put this ability from your graveyard into your hand.

name: Fel Fury
rules: Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 fire damage to each non-Demon hero and ally. Then destroy this ability if you control no Demons.

name: Feral Dominance
rules: Ongoing: 1, [Exhaust] -> Target Druid you control has Assault 1 or Protector this turn.

name: Fingers of Frost
rules: Frost Hero Required; If you have ten or more cards I your hand, opposing cards can't attack or exhaust until the start of your next turn.

name: Fit of Rage
rules: Ongoing: 2, [Exhaust], Destroy an equipment you control -> Your hero deals melee damage to target hero or ally equal to that equipment's cost.

name: Flame Burst
rules: Attach to target hero or ally, and your hero deals 2 fire damage to it. Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 2 fire damage to attached target.

name: Fortify
rules: Your hero has Protector this turn. Your hero has +X ATK while protecting this turn, where X is the cost of target non-hero Paladin or Warrior you control.

name: Freezing Arrow
rules: Trap (You may exhaust your defending hero rather than pay this card's cost) Remove target opposing attacker from combat. It can't ready during it's controller's next ready step.

name: Frost Resistance Aura
rules: Ongoing: Friendly allies have Frost Resistance while ready. (Prevent all [Frost] damage that would be dealt to them.)

name: Frost Resistance Totem
rules: Ongoing: Friendly heroes and allies have Frost Resistance.;(Totems can be attacked or targeted like allies.)

name: Frost Rune
rules: As an additional cost to play, remove an ability in your graveyard from the game.;Ongoing: [Exhaust] -> You pay 1 less to play your next card this turn.

name: Frost Strike
rules: Frost Hero Required; Your hero deals frost damage to target hero or ally equal to the ATK of a weapon you control. Up to X target opposing cards can't attack or exhaust this turn, where X is the ATK of a weapon you control.

name: Frost Surge
rules: Your hero deals X frost damage to target hero or ally, where X is the cost of a non-hero Mage or Shaman you control. A character dealt damage this way can't attack or exhaust this turn.

name: Frost Ward
rules: Your hero has Frost Resistance this turn. (Prevent all [Frost] damage that would be dealt to it.);When damage that an opposing hero or ally would deal is prevented this way, your hero may deal that much frost damage to target hero or ally.

name: Gale Winds
rules: Balance Hero Required; Ongoing: Abilites you control can be exhausted to pay costs as though they were resources.

name: Heroic Throw
rules: You may discard a weapo rather than pay this ability's cost. Your hero deals 4 ranged damage to target hero or ally.

name: Hex
rules: Attach to target ally.;Ongoing: Attached ally becomes 1 / 1, can't gain or lose ATK or [Health], and is also a frog.

name: Inner Rage
rules: Your hero has Assault X this turn, where X is the cost of target non-hero Druid or Warrior you control.

name: Instant Poison
rules: You may play this ability without paying its costs if you hero dealt combat damage to an opposing hero this turn. Attach to target opposing hero.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 nature damage to attached hero.

name: Lava Burst
rules: You may destroy an ability you control. Your hero deals 2 fire damage to target ally, or 6 if you destroyed an ability this way.

name: Mark of Life
rules: Attach to target ally.;Ongoing: Attached ally has +2 / +2 and Mend 1.

name: Mark of Undeath
rules: Attach to target friendly non-token ally.;Ongoing: When attached ally is destroyed, put a 3 [Melee] / 3 [Health] Ghoul ally token into play. When attached ally is destroyed, put this ability from its owner's graveyard into play attached to target friendly non-token ally.

name: Mind Sear
rules: Your hero deals 2 shadow damage to each opposing hero and ally.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 2 shadow damage to each opposing hero and ally if its controller has no cards in his hand.

name: Natural Reclamation
rules: Ongoing: When you complete a quest, you may put a 1 [Melee] / 1 [Health] Treant ally token into play.

name: Necessary Sacrifice
rules: Destroy target Demon, Ghoul, or Scourge ally with cost X or less, where X is the cost of a non-hero Paladin or Warlock you control.

name: Nether Rift
rules: Search your deck for a Felhunter, Imp, Succubus, and Voidwalker ally and reveal them. If you revealed four cards this way, put them into your hand. Otherwise, shuffle them into your deck.

name: Paint Bomb
rules: Attach to target ally.;Ongoing:: As this ability enters play, name a class.;Allies in attached ally's party have that class and lose all other classes.;(received errata)
flavour: It's the only kind of bomb they let me use. - Pugg

name: Paralyze
rules: Choose ability, ally, or equipment. Target player can't play cards of that kind during his next turn

name: Payment of Blood
rules: Destroy target equipment. If you do, put X damage on your hero and draw X cards, where X is that equipment's cost.

name: Penetrating Shots
rules: Play only if you control a Ranged weapon. Choose X of the following: Your hero deals 3 ranged damage to target hero; your hero deals 3 ranged damage to target ally; target hero has -3 ATK this turn, or target ally has -3 ATK this turn.

name: Pierce
rules: Attach to target ally and your hero deals 2 melee damage to it.;Ongoing: Attached ally has -2 [Health]

name: Poach
rules: Look at target player's hand and choose an ability, ally or equipment card with cost 4 or less. He discards that card.

name: Power Infusion
rules: Discipline Hero Required; Ongoing: At the start of your turn, add a haste counter. For each haste counter, you pay 1 less to play your first card each turn

name: Prayer of Spirit
rules: Ongoing: [Exhaust] -> Ready a resource you control for each ally you control.

name: Prayer of Vitality
rules: Your hero heals all damage from allies you control.;Ongoing: Allies you control have +1 [Health]

name: Predatory Sense
rules: Your hero has Assault 2 this turn.;Ongoing: Your hero has cat form.

name: Primal Focus
rules: Ongoing: At the end of your turn, ready up to two resources you control.

name: Primal Taming
rules: Attach to target ally or weapon.;Ongoing: Attached card has -X ATK, where X is the highest cost among Hunter and Shaman allies you control.

name: Psychic Shriek
rules: Put each ally into its owner's hand.

name: Ravage
rules: Your hero deals 2 melee damage to target ally, or 4 if you control a Form.

name: Reckoning
rules: Protection Hero Required; Ongoing: When your hero is dealt combat damage on an opponent's turn, you may ready a card you control.

name: Restitution
rules: Put target ally with Assault, Mend, or Protector and cost less than or equal to the number of resources you control from your graveyard into play. Draw a card.

name: Rune Strike
rules: Your hero deals 3 melee damage to target ally, or put that ally on the bottom of its owner's deck if you control a rune.

name: Savage Roar
rules: Finishing Move (To play, remove X Combo cards in your graveyard from the game, where X is 5 or less.);Ongoing: This ability enters play with X roar counters.;While you control a Form, your hero has Assault 1 for each roar counter.

name: Seal of Purity
rules: Ongoing: Weapons you control have Assault 1. When your hero deals combat damage with a weapon, you may destroy target ability that's attached to a friendly card.

name: Sharp Eye
rules: Target hero or ally you control has Assault 2 and Long-Range this turn.

name: Spiritual Awakening
rules: Ongoing: At the start of your turn, remove all but 14 damage from your hero.

name: Thunderstorm
rules: Elemental Hero Required; Exhaust all opposing heroes and allies. Your hero deals 1 nature damage to each of them. Ready a resource you control for each character dealt damage this way.;(received errata)

name: Torment of Shadows
rules: Attach to target hero or ally.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals X shadow damage to attached character, where X is the cost of a non-hero Priest or Warlock you control.

name: Warbringer
rules: Protection Hero Required; Ongoing: [Exhaust] -> [Warrior] abilities and equipment in your hand are instant this turn until you play a card.

name: Whiteout
rules: Your hero deals 3 frost damage to each opposing hero and ally.;Ongoing: Opposing heroes and allies can't attack unless their controller pays 1 for each attacker.

name: Akiko the Alert
rules: [Hunter] Pets you control have +2 / +2.

name: Alchemist Finklestein
rules: Argent Crusade Reputation (You can't put cards with other reputations in your deck.);1, Discard a Unique card -> Draw a card.

name: Ashnaar, Frost Herald
rules: Your hero has Assault X, where X is this ally's ATK.

name: Azjol-anak Deathwatcher
rules: Nerubian Reputation (You can't put cards with other reputations in your deck.) When this ally enters play, you may search your deck for a card and put it into your graveyard.

name: Azjol-anak Skirmisher
rules: Nerubian Reputation (You can't put cards with other reputations in your deck.) At the start of your turn, discard a card.

name: Babagahnoosh the Grumpy
rules: When this ally enters play, turn all resources you control face down and discard your hand.
flavour: Out of my way - I have important matters to attend to!

name: Banshee Soulclaimer
rules: Scourge Hero Required; [Alliance] and [Horde] allies have -1 / -1.

name: Bath'rah the Windwatcher
rules: When each Shaman you control exhausts for the first time each turn, you may ready it.

name: Bradford the Frozen
rules: 1, Discard a [Mage] card with cost X -> This ally deals X frost damage to target ally.

name: Bronwyn Lightborn
rules: Frost Resistance (Prevent all frost ([Frost]) damage that would be dealt to this ally.);At the start of your turn, you may destroy this ally. If you do, destroy target ability.

name: Buma Sharpstride
rules: Scourge heroes and allies have -2 ATK while in combat with this ally.

name: Cold Bones
rules: Frost Resistance;Your hero has Frost Resistance.

name: Conqueror Edge
rules: When this ally enters play, you may put target [Hunter] equipment on the bottom of its owner's deck.

name: Conqueror Nairi
rules: If an opposing Shaman would deal damage, prevent 2 of it.

name: Conqueror Tristos
rules: This ally has Assault 2 and Long-Range while attacking Mages.

name: Crypt Fiend
rules: Scourge Hero Required; Prevent all damage that [Alliance] and [Horde] allies would deal to this ally.

name: Cynthia Masters
rules: Assault 1. This ally has an additional Assault 1 for each other [Frost] ally you control.

name: Deathlord Jones
rules: When this ally enters play, put a 3 [Melee] / 3 [Health] Unique Ghoul ally token named Brode into play exhausted with This ally can't ready during its controller's ready step.;Once per turn, on your turn: 3 -> This ally deals 3 shadow damage to target hero or ally. Ready a Ghoul you control.

name: Deuce
rules: Beast Mastery Hero Required; While this ally is in your graveyard, you can control an additional Pet.

name: Doom
rules: Assault 4 (This ally has +4 ATK on your turn)

name: Fel Infernal
rules: When you discard a card, you may pay 1. If you do, this ally deals 1 fire damage to each opposing hero and ally.

name: Frostweaver Dakar'sith
rules: Opposing heroes and allies can't attack unless their controller exhausts two other cards he controls for each attacker.

name: Hansi Wildcoat
rules: Protector (This ally may exhaust to become a defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.) Heroes and allies you control with Mend also have Assault 1.

name: Hazlow Mudshuggle
rules: At the start of your turn, you may destroy this ally. If you do, destroy target equipment.

name: Hemet Nesingwary
rules: Hunters you control can be exhausted to pay costs as though they were resources.

name: Hulking Abomination
rules: Scourge Hero Required; Protector 1, Remove an Unlimited card in your graveyard from the game -> This ally heals all damage from itself.

name: Jaina, Lady of Theramore
rules: Frost Resistance;Each opponent pays 1 more to play cards that share a card type with a card in his graveyard. You pay 1 less to play cards that share a card type with a card in your graveyard, to a minimum of 1
flavour: The longer you insist upon confronting me, the more agonizing you will find defeat.

name: Jaktip
rules: Elusive. [Exhaust] -> This ally deals 1 fire damage to target hero or ally. 1, exhaust a warlock you control -> Ready this ally.

name: Jasmine von Ludrow
rules: Frost Resistance

name: Justicar Andra Goldblast
rules: 2 -> When the next opposing Mage or [Mage] card enters play this turn, destroy it.

name: Justicar Johanna Rastol
rules: Protector (This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.) When an opposing Shaman deals damage to a hero or ally you control, that Shaman also deals that much nature damage to itself.

name: Justicar Nordar Stonegrave
rules: Opposing Hunters and [Hunter] Pets have -2 ATK.

name: King Ymiron
rules: Scourge Hero Required; When this ally enters play, for each Unlimited ally you control, you may search your deck for an ally with the same name as that Unlimited ally and put it into play.

name: Koltira Deathweaver
rules: Protector Once per turn: Turn a resouce you control face down Target ally has +5 ATK this turn.

name: Kozik Skullcracker
rules: Stealth

name: Kuz'Vun
rules: Long-Range

name: Kylanda the Harmonious
rules: Protector (This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.) Totems you control have +3 [Health].

name: Kysa Shadowstalker
rules: When this ally enters play, target hero has Stealth this turn.

name: Lissie Spizfrat
rules: On your turn: [Exhaust] -> This ally deals 3 shadow damage to each hero and ally.

name: Loate Grimtusk
rules: Long-Range;When this ally attacks, put him into his owner's hand at the end of this turn.

name: Madrea Bluntbrew
rules: Frost Resistance;When this ally enters play, look at target opponent's hand and choose an ability or equipment. He discards that card.

name: Malefic Necromancer
rules: Scourge Hero Required; When this ally enters play, you may put target ally in your graveyard on the top of your deck.

name: Marauding Geist
rules: Scourge Hero Required; This ally can't attack unless there is at least one card in each graveyard.

name: Orbaz Bloodbane
rules: Scourge Hero Required; Put 3 damage counters on this ally, destroy a quest or location you control -> Target player destroys a card of that type her controls.;Death Rattle: Your hero has Assault 1 this turn.

name: Overlord Drakuru
rules: Scourge Hero Required; This ally has Assault X, where X is the highest cost among Scourge allies you control.

name: Pathfinder Fansal
rules: Long-Range At the start of your turn, you may look at the top card of target player's deck. You may put it into its owner's graveyard.;Death Rattle: Each player reveals the top card of his deck. You may put any number of those cards into their owners' graveyards.
flavour: That which has come from the grave must be returned to it.

name: Phantrich
rules: Mend 3

name: Plague Eruptor
rules: Scourge Hero Required; When this ally is dealt non-fatal damage, destroy it. If you do, it deals that much nature damage to each opposing hero and ally.

name: Rhonin
rules: 2, Discard a Mage with cost X -> Interrupt target card with cost X.

name: Rhyllor of the Glade
rules: Protector, Assault 1, Mend 1

name: Savuka the Acute
rules: While you control a [Hunter] Ranged weapon, this ally has Assault X and Long-Range, where X is the highest ATK among [Hunter] Ranged weapons you control.

name: Shade of Arugal
rules: Scourge Hero Required; Death Rattle: You may destroy an Unlimited Scourge ally you control. If you do, put this ally from your graveyard into play.

name: Sindragosa, the Frost Queen
rules: Scourge Hero Required; At the start of each turn, you may remove five cards in one graveyard from the game. If you do, this ally deals 5 frost damage to target hero or ally. A character dealt damage this way can't attack or protect this turn.

name: Skeletal Warhorse
rules: Undead Hero Required; You pay 1 less to complete quests. When you place a resource face up, you may remove target card in a graveyard from the game. (Mounts can't attack or be attacked.)

name: Sparkington the Abrupt
rules: Mages and [Mage] cards in your hand are instant.

name: Stephen Hathrow
rules: On your turn: 3, Destroy another ally you control -> Destroy target equipment.

name: Stonespine Gargoyle
rules: Scourge Hero Required; When this ally is ready, prevent all damage that would be dealt to it.

name: Swift Palomino
rules: Human Hero Required; You pay 1 less to complete quests. When you place a resource face up, you pay 1 less to play your next [Alliance] ally this turn. (Mounts can't attack or be attacked.)

name: Tani Bixtix
rules: At the start of your turn, this ally may deal 1 nature damage to target Scourge hero or ally.

name: Thassarian
rules: Protector;Once per turn: Turn a resource you control face down Target ally has -5 ATK this turn.

name: Thrall, Warchief of the Horde
rules: Protector, Frost Resistance;When this ally enters play, you may put target [Horde] card from your graveyard into your hand. Other [Horde] allies you control have +2/+2.
flavour: Be bathed in my power! Drink in my might! Battle for the glory of the Horde!

name: Torashu Stronghoof
rules: Mend 2.;This ally has -1 ATK for each damage on him.

name: Treewatcher Kursha
rules: When this ally readies, you may destroy target ability and/or equipment.

name: Uh'gali the Elementalist
rules: Protector (This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.) Exhaust a Totem you control -> Ready this ally.

name: Vanora Moonshot
rules: At the start of your turn, target ally has Assault 3 this turn.

rules: Frost Resistance;[Exhaust] -> Target ally can't attack or protect this turn.

rules: Opposing allies with Resistance have -1 [Health]

rules: Protector. When this ally defends, it heals 1 damage from itself.

name: Wooly White Rhino
rules: Frost Resistance;You pay 1 less to complete quests.;When you place a resource face up, choose one: Your hero can't be protected against this turn, or the next time your hero would deal damage this turn, it's unpreventable.

rules: Scourge Hero Required;Protector -> When this ally enters play, you may search your deck for an ally with the same name, reveal it and put it into your hand.

name: Zaduru
rules: This ally has Assault 1 for each ready opposing resource.

name: Avalanche
rules: When you strike with this weapon, your hero has Long-Range this combat. When your hero deals combat damage with this weapon to a hero, your hero deals that much frost damage to target ally in that hero's party.

name: Bitter Cold Armguards
rules: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 frost to target hero or ally you control.

name: Black Ice
rules: When you strike with this weapon on an opponent's turn, your hero may deal 1 frost damage to target hero or ally. A character dealt damage this way can't attack this turn.

name: Chilly Slobberknocker
rules: As this weapon enters play, name two damage types. If the first type of damage would be dealt, that much +1 is dealt instead. If the second type of damage would be dealt, that much -1 is dealt instead.

name: Flare of the Heavens
rules: [Hunter] Hero: At the start of your turn, you may look at the top card of an opponent's deck. You may put it into his graveyard. [Mage] Hero: At the start of your turn, you may look at the top card of your deck. You may put it into your graveyard.

name: Frost-bound Chain Bracers
rules: When you strike with a weapon, your hero may deal 1 frost damage to target hero or ally.;Death Rattle: You pay 2 less to strike with weapons this turn.

name: Frostbridge Orb
rules: [Druid] Hero: Cards you control with Mend have an additional Mend 1. [Mage] Hero: Cards you control with Assault have an additional Assault 1.

name: Frostweave Bandage
rules: 1, Destroy this item -> Your hero heals 4 damage from target hero or ally.;Death Rattle: Target hero or ally has Frost Resistance this turn.

name: Glacial Bag
rules: Exhaust a Bag you control -> Add a thaw counter. [Exhaust], Remove four thaw counters -> Draw three cards

name: Gloves of the Frozen Glade
rules: 3, [Exhaust] -> Ready your hero and all Melee weapons you control.;Death Rattle: Your hero has Stealth this turn.
flavour: Admire them for just a moment, and you will see a rare glimpse into a piece of life frozen in time. - Lunira Swiftbreath

name: Hailstorm
rules: 1, Remove five cards in your graveyard from the game -> Your hero deals 1 frost damage to each opposing hero and ally.;Death Rattle: Your hero deals 1 frost damage to each opposing hero and ally.

name: Hero's Surrender
rules: Opposing heroes lose and can't have powers. Your hero can protect against opposing heroes.

name: Iceshear Mantle
rules: [Exhaust] -> Target [Frost] card has Assault 2 this turn. (It has +2 ATK on your turn)

name: Iceshrieker's Touch
rules: When your hero turns face down, it deals 1 frost damage to each opposing hero and ally. A character dealt damage this way can't attack or exhaust this turn.;Death Rattle: Each player turns his hero face up.

name: Icy Scale Chestguard
rules: If a friendly hero or ally would deal frost ([Frost]) damage, it deals that much +1 instead.

name: Journey's End
rules: [Druid] Hero: 1,[Exhaust] , Destroy a resource you control -> Druids you control have Assault 2 and Stealth this turn. [Hunter] Hero: 1, [Exhaust], Destroy a resource you control -> Hunters you control have Assault 2 and Long-Range this turn.

name: Kel'Thuzad's Reach
rules: When your hero deals combat damage with this weapon to a hero, you may destroy this weapon. If you do, put target ally in an opponent's graveyard into play under your control.

name: Kingsbane
rules: Your hero has Dual Wield. This weapon has Assault X while your hero is attacking, where X is the ATK of a defender.

name: Legplates of the Endless Void
rules: [Exhaust], Put 3 damage on your hero -> Draw a card.;Death Rattle: Put 3 damage on your hero and draw a card.

name: Nesingwary 4000
rules: When you strike with this weapon, your hero has Long-Range this combat. While there are four or more allies with the same name in one opposing graveyard, this weapons's ATK becomes 4000.

name: Portal Stone
rules: On your turn: 1, -> Remove target ally you control from the game. On your turn: 1, -> Put an ally removed by the card named Portal Stone into play under your control.

name: Shawl of Haunted Memories
rules: 1, [Exhaust] , Destroy this armor -> Destroy target ability, ally, or equipment that shares a name with a card in its controller's graveyard.;Death Rattle: Target opponent puts the top three cards of his deck into his graveyard.

rules: 1, [Exhaust] -> Ready target Ghoul. When you play a weapon, ready this item

rules: Youre hero has +1 [Health] for each soul counter.;[Death Knight] Hero: Opposing allies everywhere have Death Rattle: Add a soul counter to this item.;[Priest] Hero: Opposing abilities everywhere have Death Rattle: Add a soul counter to this item.

rules: Thrown (When you strike with this weapon, your hero has Long-Range this combat. At the end of this turn, put this weapon into its owner's hand.);When you strike with this weapon, put the top card of target opponent's deck into the graveyard. rules: Death Rattle: [Rogue] Hero: Exhaust target hero or ally. [Shaman] Hero: Ready target hero or ally.

rules: [Hunter] Hero: Your hero has Pet (1). [Warlock] Hero: Your hero is also a Demon.

rules: At the end of your turn, your hero heals all damage from allies you control. Then, it heals that much damage from itself.

rules: You pay 5 less to strike with this weapon if you have a card with the same name as this weapon in your graveyard.

rules: Opposing heros and allies lose, and can't have Resistances.

name: Arch Druid Lilliandra
rules: Argent Crusade Reputation Flip Lilliandra, remove a Druid in your graveyard from the game -> When Lilliandra is dealt combat damage this turn, she deals 1 nature damage to the source of that damage.;;Deckbuilding: You can only include either [Alliance] or [Horde] cards, [Druid] cards, [Druid] Balance Talents, neutral cards, and Argent Crusade cards. You can't include cards with other reputations or other text restrictions.

name: Argent Confessor Paletress
rules: Argent Crusade Reputation Flip Paletress, remove a Priest in your graveyard from the game -> The next time target hero or ally would be dealt damage this turn, prevent it.;;Deckbuilding: You can only include either [Alliance] or [Horde] cards, [Priest] cards, [Priest] Discipline Talents, neutral cards, and Argent Crusade cards. You can't include cards with other reputations or other text restrictions.

name: Askalti Darksteel
rules: Flip Askalti, remove a Scourge ally in your graveyard from the game -> Target ally has +1 / -1 this turn.;;Deckbuilding: You can only include [Warlock] abilities and Pets, [Warrior] equipment, allies with ally type Death Knight, neutral quests and locations, and Scourge cards. You can't include cards with reputations or other text restrictions (like Demonology Hero Required).

name: Blood Lord Vorath
rules: Flip Vorath, remove a Scourge ally in your graveyard from the game -> Vorath deals 1 shadow damage to target ally for each ally in its controller's graveyard.;;Deckbuilding: You can only include [Death Knight] abilities, [Priest] equipment, allies with ally type Death Knight, neutral quests and locations, and Scourge cards. You can't include cards with reputations or other text restrictions (like Frost Hero Required).

name: Dalronn The Controller
rules: Flip Dalronn, remove a Warlock in your graveyard from the game -> Target Demon has +3 ATK this turn.;;Deckbuilding: You can only include either [Alliance] or [Horde] cards, [Warlock] cards, [Warlock] Demonology Talents, neutral cards, and Scourge cards. You can't include cards with reputations or other text restrictions.

name: Deathseer Zuk'raj
rules: Flip Zuk'Raj, remove a Scourge ally in your graveyard from the game -> The next time Zuk'Raj would deal nature damage this turn, he deals that much +1 instead.;;Deckbuilding: You can only include [Druid] abilities, [Shaman] equipment, allies with ally type Death Knight, neutral quests and locations, and Scourge cards. You can't include cards with reputations or other text restrictions (like Balance Hero Required).

name: Eadric the Pure
rules: Argent Crusade Reputation;Flip Eadric, remove a paladin in your graveyard from the game -> Target friendly ally has Untargetable this turn.;;Deckbuilding: You can only include either [Alliance] or [Horde] cards, [Paladin] cards, [Paladin] Protection Talents, neutral cards, and Argent Crusade cards. You can't include cards with other reputations or other text restrictions.

name: General Lightsbane
rules: On your turn: Flip Lightsbane, remove a Death Knight in your graveyard from the game -> Target ally has -4 ATK this turn.;;Deckbuilding: You can only include either [Alliance] or [Horde] cards, [Death Knight] cards, [Death Knight] Frost Talents, neutral cards, and Scourge cards. You can't include cards with reputations or other text restrictions.

name: Kjaran the Callous
rules: Flip Kjaran, remove a Scourge ally in your graveyard from the game -> Kjaran deals 1 melee damage and 1 ranged damage to target attacker.;;Deckbuilding: You can only include [Hunter] abilities and Pets, [Paladin] equipment, allies with ally type Death Knight, neutral quests and locations, and Scourge cards. You can't include cards with reputations or other text restrictions (like Beast Mastery Hero Required).

name: Overseer Savryn
rules: On your turn: Flip Savryn, remove a Rogue in your graveyard from the game -> This turn, melee weapons you control have Assault 1, and combat damage your hero would deal is unpreventable.;;Deckbuilding: You can only include either [Alliance] or [Horde] cards, [Rogue] cards, [Rogue] Combat Talents, neutral cards, and Scourge cards. You can't include cards with reputations or other text restrictions.

name: Queen Angerboda
rules: Flip Angerboda, remove a Mage in your graveyard from the game -> Target ally can't attack this turn.;;Deckbuilding: You can only include either [Alliance] or [Horde] cards, [Mage] cards, [Mage] Frost talents, neutral cards, and Scourge cards. You can't include cards with reputations or other text restrictions.

name: Rimblat Earthshatter
rules: Argent Crusade Reputation;Flip Rimblat, remove a Shaman in your graveyard from the game -> Destroy target ability that's not attached to a friendly card.;;Deckbuilding: You can only include either [Alliance] or [Horde] cards, [Shaman] cards, [Shaman] Elemental Talents, neutral cards, and Argent Crusade cards. You can't include cards with other reputations or other text restrictions.

name: Syreian the Bonecarver
rules: Flip Syreian, remove a Hunter in your graveyard from the game -> Ready target Pet.;;Deckbuilding: You can only include either [Alliance] or [Horde] cards, [Hunter] cards, [Hunter] Beast Mastery Talents, neutral cards, and Scourge cards. You can't include cards with reputations or other text restrictions.

name: Thane Ufrang the Mighty
rules: Flip Ufrang, remove a Warrior in your graveyard from the game -> Target hero or ally has Protector this turn.;;Deckbuilding: You can only include either [Alliance] or [Horde] cards, [Warrior] cards, [Warrior] Protection Talents, neutral cards, and Scourge cards. You can't include cards with reputations or other text restrictions.

name: Turov the Risen
rules: On your turn: Flip Turov, remove a Scourge ally in your graveyard from the game -> Turov deals 2 frost damage to target exhausted ally.;;Deckbuilding: You can only include [Mage] abilities, [Rogue] equipment, allies with ally type Death Knight, neutral quests and locations, and Scourge cards. You can't include cards with reputations or other text restrictions (like Frost Hero Required ).

name: Orgrim's Hammer
rules: When a quest you control turns face down, add a cannonball counter.;On your turn: 1, [Exhaust], Remove two cannoball counters -> Your hero deals 4 ranged damage to target ally.

name: The Skybreaker
rules: When a quest you control turns face down, add a cannonball counter.;On your turn: 1, [Exhaust], Remove two cannonball counters -> Your hero deals 4 ranged damage to target hero.

name: Metamorphosis
rules: Demonology Hero Required; At the start of your turn, put your starting hero back into pay unless you destroy an ally you control. If you destroyed an ally this way, your hero deals shadow damage equal to that ally's cost to target hero or ally.

name: The Lich King
rules: Scourge or [Death Knight] Hero Required; At the start of each player's turn, put target ally from that player's graveyard into play under your control. Allies you control are also Scourge allies.
flavour: I will show you the justice of the grave...and the true meaning of fear.

name: A Hero's Burden
rules: Pay 1 and name a class to complete this quest.;Reward: Reveal the top four cards of your deck. Put a revealed ally of that class into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

name: A Proper String
rules: On your turn: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Heroes and allies you control have Long-Range this turn

name: All Things in Good Time
rules: Nerubian Reputation (You can't put cards with other reputations in your deck.) Pay 8 or discard an ability, ally, and equipment to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw three cards.

name: Army of the Damned
rules: Scourge Hero Required; Name a Scourge ally. For each ally you control with that name, you may pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card for each 2 paid this way.

name: Cold Hearted
rules: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card. Target ally's damage type becomes [Frost] this turn.
flavour: To be slain honorably on the field of battle brings us all glory. To be frozen in a block of ice and endlessly taunted does not… - Brijana

name: Everfrost
rules: Pay 6 to complete this quest.;Reward: Target player shuffles his graveyard into his deck. Draw two cards.

name: Rituals of Power
rules: Pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Target opposing card loses and can't have powers this turn.

name: Spirit Totem
rules: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Ready target ally or weapon you control.

name: That's Abominable!
rules: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw two cards. Then if you have three or more cards in your hand, discard two cards.

name: The Boon of A'dal
rules: On an opponent's turn: Pay 7 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw three cards.

name: The Boon of Alexstrasza
rules: On an opponent's turn: Pay 4 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw two cards.

name: The Boon of Remulos
rules: On an opponent's turn: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw one card.

name: The Last Line of Defense
rules: On your turn: Destroy a resource you control to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.

name: The Rider of Frost
rules: Pay 4 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card. You pay 1 less to complete quests this turn.

name: The Storm King's Vengeance
rules: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put a revealed ability, ally or equipment with cost less than or equal to the amount of damage on your hero, into your hand, and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

name: Tirion's Gambit
rules: Argent Crusade Reputation (You can't put cards with other reputations in your deck.) Pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put a revealed Unique card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

name: Portal Stone
rules: On your turn: 1, -> Remove target ally you control from the game. On your turn: 1, -> Put an ally removed by the card named Portal Stone into play under your control.

name: Paint Bomb
rules: Attach to target ally.;Ongoing:: As this ability enters play, name a class.;Allies in attached ally's party have that class and lose all other classes.;(received errata)
flavour: It's the only kind of bomb they let me use. - Pugg

name: Wooly White Rhino
rules: Frost Resistance;You pay 1 less to complete quests.;When you place a resource face up, choose one: Your hero can't be protected against this turn, or the next time your hero would deal damage this turn, it's unpreventable.

name: Sindragosa, the Frost Queen
rules: Scourge Hero Required; At the start of each turn, you may remove five cards in one graveyard from the game. If you do, this ally deals 5 frost damage to target hero or ally. A character dealt damage this way can't attack or protect this turn.
